title: Victoria's Favourite Things. Segment 3
subject_group: Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Victoria - Social life and customs
Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Interactive media
abstract: Motorbikes, toys, poetry, teddies, children, Chopper Reed & Randall the horse
description: The results of July 2004's Open House weekend program 'Victoria's Favourite Things'. This segment has David from Birregurra talking about his new Motorbike; Paul, Louise, Ella and Matthew show us a Duck and Mr Pumpkin Head; Lucy from Perth shares a Poem; Alisha and Anna from Canterbury talk about Teddy Sascha and Alisha; Mary from Watsonia explains her passion for her horse; Mark and Liz talk about their kids; and Danielle from Melbourne discusses her favourite film 'Chopper'.
